# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -O gso-service-gateway-1.0.0-RC0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1052/org/openo/gso/gui/service-gateway-deployment/1.0.0-RC0/service-gateway-deployment-1.0.0-RC0.zip
RUN unzip -o -B gso-service-gateway-1.0.0-RC0.zip
RUN rm -f gso-service-gateway-1.0.0-RC0.zip
EXPOSE 8305
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC0 autorelease-1052 > VERSION
